meanings.definition: A person with whom one shares a secret or private matter.
meanings.sent1: My confidant, Sarah, knows all my secrets.
meanings.sent2: I always turn to my confidant for advice and support.
meanings.sent3: My confidant, Tom, can keep a secret better than anyone I know.
meanings.sent4: She was like a confidant, a vault of trust and understanding.
meanings.sent5: In times of need, a confidant can be a true lifesaver.

meanings.definition: A close friend or associate whom one trusts and confides in.
meanings.sent1: My confidant, Alex, is always there for me.
meanings.sent2: She is not just a friend, but a confidant I can rely on.
meanings.sent3: Laughing together, my confidant and I shared our deepest thoughts.
meanings.sent4: A true confidant is like a mirror, reflecting back your true self.
meanings.sent5: The bond between confidants is unbreakable and precious.
